Ancelotti: “Bale’s performance wasn’t good against Juventus just like the whole team’s performance wasn’t good”
Ancelotti: “Barcelona played a good game against Bayern Munich and Messi played well like the rest of the team”.
Ancelotti: "Sergio Ramos' performance against Juventus doesn't mean he can't play there, i will use him if I need him there"
Ancelotti: “Khedira has not recovered yet from a foot injury”
Ancelotti: "I will decide tomorrow whether Benzema starts or not."
Ancelotti: "Benzema is still not 100% yet, but he is available for the game tomorrow. He's feeling good."
Ancelotti: “Valencia is playing very well, they are fighting for a spot for the Champions League and they are having a good season”
Ancelotti: "Both of our games are in home and we are confident about these two important matches."
Ancelotti (on Juventus): “We can fix the result we had in the first leg of the Semifinals of the Champions League”
Ancelotti: Liga strike? “I think La Liga will continue normally. I think the parties involved will find a solution”
Isco: Ramos in midfield? "No, we hadn't trained for that at all. No. Well, maybe I wasn't there"
Isco: "After so many months of playing everything & then not even getting a game...How do I feel? I wouldn't say hurt, I'd say very unhappy"
Ancelotti wasn't pleased by Isco's comments after the Atletico game and with the change in Isco's attitude over the last month [Marca]
Capello: "I am with Carlo. The team he puts out on the pitch is perfect."
Capello: "Madrid has a lot of quality but the absence of Modric is a blow."
Capello: "Juventus has good players, they are very solid. You know what needs to be done"

Capello on the match in Turin:

"It was a power game. At 2-1 it leaves everything open."
Capello: "Raúl started on the left because I had nowhere else to put him with Suker and Mijatovic in attack."
Capello: "Seedorf, who was more attacking, alongside Redondo."
Capello: "I remember that I won my 1st league title playing with only one central midfielder in Redondo"
Capello:  "As a coach I had to play with the players we had. So I think that we did great things."
Capello: "There is a hope that they will relax a little, like what happened in Seville. The match against Atlético could be good for that."
Capello: "Everybody knows I’m a Real Madrid fan. But Barcelona are at a high level, look what they did to Bayern Munich. It was incredible"
Capello on the current Madrid: "They are fighting together, with heart, and it shows, you can see it on the pitch."
Capello: "Madrid has a very good, very intelligent coach. And I see the same team spirit there that we had."
Capello: "I think this Madrid also started to believe after they played in the Camp Nou, where they could take plenty of positives"
Capello: "I’ve heard of ‘Operation 30 Points’. Yes…it’s the same goal that we set ourselves."
Capello: "All the players played superbly. They were absolutely superb, wanting it with faith and through their quality."
Capello: "Ronaldo had to leave the club in the January transfer window."
Capello: "I include Beckham, who played on even though he had signed his contract with LA Galaxy"
Capello: "The Spanish players in particular, as well as Van Nistelrooy and Roberto Carlos from the foreign players."

Capello on who was the leader in that dressing room:

"Everyone in truth. I don’t want to differentiate one from another."
Capello: "If you ensure that everyone is together you can achieve great things."
Capello: "You always have to believe in things. There must be fight, to have faith in your team and in your system."
Capello:"The goalaverage favored us because of the draw at the Camp Nou. They played all the matches with the feeling that each was a final"
Capello: "It was a plan to get them all together, we pulled five points back in nine matches"
Capello: I said to them: “There are 12 finals. Are you able to endure that?”
Capello: "but still, my players saw that they were much better than them and we all took encouragement from that."
Capello: "The third goal was scored right at the very end, in the last minute of injury time"

Capello on the turning point in that title success:
"For me it was the Clásico at the Camp Nou, the 3-3 with the hat-trick from Messi"

Capello on the last Liga title he won with Madrid (closing a five point gap on Barça in nine matches):

"It was something heroic!" [as]
